description: This service checks the social media and online platform presence associated with a given phone number and email address. It provides a list of platforms where the user is active, along with a count of active profiles, for alternate data-based verification workflows.
llm_summary: Social Media Presence service identifies the platforms where a user is active based on their phone number and email address. Useful for alternate data verification, fraud prevention, and compliance workflows.
use_cases: Verify the social media presence of a user for onboarding workflows.
Support compliance and fraud prevention by analyzing social media activity.
Enable alternate data-based KYC processes in financial services and insurance.
Assess online activity for identity verification workflows in government and private sectors.

request_schema.description: Mobile number to check for social media presence.
Email address to check for social media presence.
User consent for accessing social media presence data

response_schema.description: Overall status of the API response
Unique request ID generated by the API
HTTP status code for the service
Details of the user's social media presence
